original:
The history of anatomy is marked by an evolving understanding of the functions of the organs and structures of the human body. Over time, methods of study have significantly advanced, transitioning from the dissection of animals and cadavers to modern medical imaging techniques such as X-ray, ultrasound, and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).


The term "anatomy" is derived from the Greek word ἀνατομή (anatomē), meaning "dissection," whi
